TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件表示一个数据源, 该数据源调用业务对象的方法以执行删除、插入、选择和更新数据库操作。The control represents a data source that calls methods of a business object in order to perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations. 在可视化设计器中, 当您从源切换到设计视图时, 将分析描述控件的标记源代码, 并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时, 会将设计时控件持久保存到标记源代码, 并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类在可视化设计器中为控件提供设计时支持。 The class provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer. 类成员提供以下功能:The class members provide the following functionality: - 属性指示是否可以显示 "配置数据源" 向导。The property indicates whether the Configure Data Source wizard can be displayed. 属性指示是否可以在设计时刷新关联控件的架构。 The property indicates whether the schema of the associated control can be refreshed at design time. - 属性指定执行 Select 函数的方法。The property specifies the method that performs the Select function. 属性指定为关联的控件提供数据的业务对象的类型。The property specifies the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control. - 方法返回具有指定名称的数据源视图。The method returns a data source view with the specified name. 方法返回关联控件的数据源视图名称的列表。 The method returns a list of data source view names for the associated control. 方法从关联的业务对象中提取 Select 方法的元数据。The method extracts the metadata for the Select method from the associated business object. - 方法导致在可视化设计器图面上显示 "配置数据源" 向导。The method causes the Configure Data Source wizard to be displayed on the visual designer surface. 方法从中删除属性, 将附加属性添加到关联控件的属性或阴影属性。The method removes properties from, adds additional properties to, or shadows properties of the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类, 以便在设计时更改从控件派生的控件的外观和行为。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例`MyObjectDataSource` 从派生控件。The example derives the `MyObjectDataSource` control from the . `MyObjectDataSource`是控件的副本。The `MyObjectDataSource` is a copy of the control. 该示例还从派生`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`类, 并在`MyObjectDataSource`控件上应用的`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`属性。The example also derives the `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` class from the and applies a attribute for the `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` on the `MyObjectDataSource` control. 重写方法, 使属性在设计时在 "属性" 网格中可见。 `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` The `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 除了`MyObjectDataSourceDesigner`控件类型和 ID 之外, 还将重写方法以显示占位符中的和属性。The `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` overrides the method to display the and properties in a placeholder, in addition to the control type and ID. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/CS/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/VB/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.vb#1)]

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Control Designers

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在可视化设计器图面上创建关联控件或该控件的副本时, 在内部构造该类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以调用 方法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method can be called; otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果关联 的控件的属性实现或 接口,则可以调用方法,属性为。 The method can be called, and the property is `true`, if the property of the associated control implements either the or the interface. 如果 为`true`, 则 "**配置数据源**" 菜单项将显示在可视化设计器图面上关联控件的 "**公共 ObjectDataSource 任务**" 上下文菜单中。If the is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface. 选择此菜单项时, 将调用 "配置数据源" 向导。The Configure Data Source wizard is invoked when this menu item is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以调用 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the can be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用 `true`方法, 如果关联控件的属性实现或接口, 则属性为, 和属性都包含一个值。The method can be called, and the property is `true`, if the property of the associated control implements either the or interface, and the and properties both contain a value. 如果 为`true`, 则 "**刷新架构**" 菜单项显示在可视化设计器图面上关联控件的 "**公共 ObjectDataSource 任务**" 上下文菜单中。If the is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

summary.span: 在可视化设计器图面上显示“配置数据源”向导。

span.span: Displays the Configure Data Source wizard on the visual designer surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会启动一个事务, 使 "配置数据源" 向导显示在可视化设计器图面上。The method initiates a transaction that causes the Configure Data Source wizard to appear on the visual designer surface. 在关联 控件的公共 ObjectDataSource 任务上下文菜单中选择 "**配置数据源**" 菜单项时, 将调用方法。The method is called when you select the **Configure Data Source** menu item on the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control. 当属性为`true`时, "**配置数据源**" 菜单项将出现在上下文菜单中。The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the context menu when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView GetView(string viewName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetView (viewName As String) As DesignerDataSourceView

param.name: viewName
param.span: 包含 的名称的字符串。

summary.span: 返回具有指定名称的数据源视图。

span.span: Returns a data source view with the specified name.

returns.span: 具有 所指定名称的 。

span.span: An with the name specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回具有指定名称的对象。 The method returns an object with the specified name. 如果`viewName` 是`null`或空字符串 (""), 则将返回的名称数组中的第一个视图名称用作指定的名称。If `viewName` is `null` or an empty string (""), the first view name in the array of names that is returned by is used as the specified name. 如果未返回任何视图名称, 则会生成一个未命名的。If no view names are returned by the , generates an unnamed .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string[] GetViewNames() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetViewNames () As String()

summary.span: 为关联的控件返回数据源视图名称列表。

span.span: Returns a list of data source view names for the associated control.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，其中包含关联的 的 对象的名称。

span.span: A string array containing the names of the objects of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从关联控件的架构数据表名称获取视图名称。The method gets the view names from the names of the schema data tables of the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法, 用设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性, 并向**属性中添加属性或从中移除属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 方法创建用于隐藏关联 控件的和属性的设计时属性,使其显示在可视化设计器的属性网格中。 The method creates design-time properties to shadow the and properties of the associated control so that they appear in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在从类继承的类中重写方法, 以便在设计时更改从类派生的控件的属性网格。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例使属性在**属性**网格中可见。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/CS/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner/VB/ObjectDataSourceDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 重写方法, 以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到属性或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void RefreshSchema(bool preferSilent) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub RefreshSchema (preferSilent As Boolean)

param.name: preferSilent
param.span: 如果为 ，则在处理过程中出现异常时将不显示错误信息；否则，将显示异常消息。

span.span: If , does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.

summary.span: 从关联控件所指定的业务对象中为“选择”方法提取元数据。

span.span: Extracts the metadata for the Select method from the business object that is specified by the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从属性命名的对象中提取由属性命名的方法的元数据, 这是为提供数据的业务对象的类型。 关联的控件。The method extracts the metadata for the method that is named by the property from the object that is named by the property, which is the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control. 元数据保存在数组和设计器的数组中。The metadata is saved in a array and in the array of the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在调用关联控件的 方法时执行的方法的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method to execute when the method of the associated control is called.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含要在调用 时执行的方法的名称。

span.span: A string containing the name of the method to execute when the is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性隐藏关联控件的属性。 The property shadows the property of the associated control. 更改属性的值时, 会更新关联控件的设计时标记。When the value of the property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated control is updated. 如果该属性为 true, 则调用方法; 否则, 将引发事件。The method is called, if the property is true; otherwise, the event is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TypeName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置类型名称，该类型包含在关联控件中指定的方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the methods that are specified in the associated control.

value.span: 包含类型名称的字符串，该类型中包含在关联的 中所指定的用以执行删除、插入、选择和更新数据库操作的方法。

span.span: A string containing the name of the type that contains the methods that perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations specified in the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性隐藏关联控件的属性。 The property shadows the property of the associated control. 更改属性的值时, 会更新关联控件的设计时标记。When the value of the property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated control is updated. 如果该属性为 true, 则调用方法; 否则, 将引发事件。The method is called, if the property is true; otherwise, the event is raised.
